mapper.sql:
SELECT T.*,o.title,m.member_name,m.real_name,m.mobile FROM QKJVIP_MEMBER_SIGNUPMEMBER T join qkjvip_member_activity o on (t.activity_id=o.id) join qkjvip_member m on (t.member_id=m.member_id) WHERE 1=1
AND o.title LIKE '%${params.title}%'
AND t.activity_id = '${params.activityId}'
AND m.mobile = '${params.mobile}'
AND ( t.member_id = '${params.memberId}' or EXISTS(SELECT 1 from qkjvip_member m where m.member_id=t.member_id and ISNULL(m.memberidto, '88')!='88' and m.memberidto='${params.memberId}') )
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 from qkjvip_member a where a.member_id=t.member_id and a.openid='${params.myopenid}')
mapper.select:
SELECT top 1 T.* FROM QKJVIP_MEMBER_SIGNUPMEMBER T WHERE 1=1
AND t.activity_id = '${params.activityId}'
AND ( t.member_id = '${params.memberId}' or EXISTS(SELECT 1 from qkjvip_member m where m.member_id=t.member_id and ISNULL(m.memberidto, '88')!='88' and m.memberidto='${params.memberId}') )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 from qkjvip_member_jueru a where a.crm_memberid = t.member_id and a.appopenid='${params.myopenid}' )
